attributes.title: Furious George
attributes.caption: ​You can't escape Furious George. He's coming for you. And he will kill you.
attributes.description: You can't escape Furious George. He's coming for you. And he will kill you.Thanks to g1 MarioMiyamoto for animating this fine piece of insanity.

attributes.title: Bland Kid
attributes.caption: You ever know that you just want to punch... or photoshop out of pictures? Sam did.
attributes.description: You ever know that you just want to punch... or photoshop out of pictures? Sam did.

attributes.title: STORMPOCALYPSE!!
attributes.caption: Chad's house has been ruined by Texas weather that will kill you. Way to go stupid weather. Now he has to go through insurance to get his claim and that's a paid in the ass. Wait! You also f'ed up his car? You're a bastard weather. See, that's why everyon
attributes.description: Chad's house has been ruined by Texas weather that will kill you. Way to go stupid weather. Now he has to go through insurance to get his claim and that's a paid in the ass. Wait! You also f'ed up his car? You're a bastard weather. See, that's why everyone hates you.

attributes.title: Seppukuma Will KILL YOU!
attributes.caption: Watch out for the most disturbing teddy bear ever.
attributes.description: Watch out for the most disturbing teddy bear ever.

attributes.title: Snorting Grandpa
attributes.caption: If you are you are the worst person in the world. Rot in Hell you piece of trash.
